item.title: Edge Middleware Error Rates
item.description:
Jun 29, 15:53 UTC
Resolved - Between 15:53 and 16:39 UTC, a small subset of Edge Middleware invocations failed with an INTERNAL_EDGE_FUNCTION_UNHANDLED_ERROR error. Our team has mitigated this issue.

item.title: Issue with Build Processing and Edge Functions
item.description:
Jun 21, 08:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 21, 08:01 UTC
Monitoring - All queued builds are processed and we are seeing improvements with the deployment of edge functions.

Jun 21, 07:43 UTC
Identified - We are investigating build failures when edge functions are included within the deployment.

Jun 21, 07:30 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented by our upstream provider and all queued builds are currently being processed. We will share another update within 30 minutes.

Jun 21, 07:04 UTC
Identified - We have identified an issue impacting build performance and edge functions. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: GitHub Deployment Errors
item.description:
Jun 20, 23:23 UTC
Resolved - All systems normal.

Jun 20, 23:07 UTC
Update - GitHub has applied a fix for their previous degradation, and all previous commits made with Vercel for GitHub should be deployed. We are continuing to monitor.

Jun 20, 21:58 UTC
Monitoring - GitHub is continuing to investigate a performance degradation that is causing issues with deployments made with Vercel for GitHub. We are continuing to monitor. For more information, see the GitHub status: https://www.githubstatus.com/

Jun 20, 20:53 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues with deployments made with Vercel for GitHub. For more information, see the GitHub status: https://www.githubstatus.com/

item.title: Elevated Dashboard and Build Errors
item.description:
Jun 17, 15:54 UTC
Resolved - All systems normal.

Jun 17, 15:40 UTC
Update - New builds are operational. All other areas have recovered. Any builds triggered between 13:20-14:45 UTC will need to be initiated again. We are continuing to monitor.

Jun 17, 15:24 UTC
Monitoring - New builds are still queued. All other areas have recovered. Any builds triggered between 13:20-15:05 UTC will need to be initiated again.

Jun 17, 15:08 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and all affected areas are currently recovering.

Jun 17, 14:30 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 17, 14:28 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of elevated error rates on deploy hooks.

Jun 17, 14:12 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 17, 14:05 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate reports of elevated error rates on the Vercel Dashboard, existing deployments, and live traffic. We will share updates as they become available.

Jun 17, 13:38 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of elevated error rates on the Vercel Dashboard. Existing deployments and live traffic are not affected by this issue. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: Log Drains Data Collection Errors
item.description:
Jun 15, 06:55 UTC
Resolved - Between 06:55am UTC and 09:28am UTC, log drains integrations did not collect data. Metrics during this time will not be backfilled.

item.title: Delayed Build Processing
item.description:
Jun 10, 05:00 UTC
Resolved - All systems normal.

item.title: Delayed Build Processing
item.description:
Jun 10, 04:30 UTC
Resolved - The issue with elevated build queue processing times has been fixed and the backlog has been processed. We are continuing to monitor.

item.title: Delayed Build Processing
item.description:
Jun 10, 02:00 UTC
Resolved - We are currently investigating elevated build queue processing times for a small number of customers. Existing deployments and live traffic are not affected by this issue. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: GitLab Integration Errors
item.description:
May 17, 20:07 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 17, 19:19 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

May 17, 17:02 UTC
Update - Our team is continuing to explore mitigations for the issue regarding some Vercel for GitLab deployments which are failing to be generated.

May 17, 14:44 UTC
Update - Our team is continuing to explore mitigations for the issue regarding some Vercel for GitLab deployments which are failing to be generated.

Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 17, 10:25 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues regarding some Vercel for GitLab deployments which are failing to be generated.

item.title: Elevated Team Creation Errors
item.description:
May 14, 13:31 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 14, 13:25 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

May 14, 13:20 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 14, 12:55 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of elevated error rates on the Vercel Dashboard after users create a team. If you experience this error, reload the application to access your new team. Existing Teams and live traffic are not affected by this issue. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: Queued builds
item.description:
May 9, 08:30 UTC
Resolved - The incident concerning elevated queued builds has been resolved. All systems normal.

May 9, 08:14 UTC
Monitoring - Builds are no longer experiencing elevated queuing times and the queue has been fully processed.

May 9, 07:29 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating elevated queued builds for a portion of our customers

item.title: Queued builds for some customers
item.description:
May 8, 21:33 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 8, 21:18 UTC
Monitoring - Builds are no longer experiencing elevated queuing times and the queue has been fully processed.

May 8, 20:55 UTC
Identified - New builds are working as expected and past queued builds are being processed.

May 8, 20:24 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating elevated queued builds for for a portion of our customers.

item.title: Middleware builds are failing
item.description:
Apr 21, 08:46 UTC
Resolved - We have implemented a fix which was causing build failures when middleware was being deployed within projects. All systems normal.

Apr 21, 08:17 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of build failure related to deploying Middleware. We will share more details as soon as we have them.

item.title: Degraded Performance
item.description:
Apr 8, 04:06 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 8, 02:51 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix and are monitoring. There were internal timeouts in one of our services that caused elevated TLS handshake times. Only a small portion of requests may have been affected.

Apr 8, 00:53 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate degraded performance across regions.

Apr 7, 23:29 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate degraded performance across regions.

Apr 7, 21:43 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating degraded performance across multiple regions.

item.title: Delayed Builds
item.description:
Mar 31, 01:35 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 31, 01:25 UTC
Monitoring - Delayed builds were reported in CLE1 at 5:36 PM PT. The incident was identified immediately and a fix implemented at 6:08 PM PT. We are monitoring recovery.

item.title: Delayed Build Processing
item.description:
Mar 29, 19:45 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 29, 17:54 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and queued builds are currently being processed.

Mar 29, 17:00 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating elevated build queue processing times for a number of customers. Existing deployments and live traffic are not affected by this issue. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: Installed Integrations Unavailable
item.description:
Mar 24, 20:53 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 24, 20:39 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented. All affected data has been restored and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 24, 14:54 UTC
Update - Our team are still implementing a fix to restore installed integrations. Restored integrations may require re-configuration. In order to mitigate against this incident faster, customers may wish to manually reinstall missing integrations.

Mar 24, 13:48 UTC
Identified - The issue causing unavailability of installed integrations has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Mar 24, 13:19 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of unavailability of installed integrations on the Vercel Dashboard. We will share updates as they become available.

item.title: Missing Build Logs
item.description:
Mar 21, 12:12 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 21, 10:03 UTC
Update - We are currently backfilling all missing build and function logs. The estimated time to complete this is 2 hours. No data loss should occur and all logs will be sent to log drains, as configured. We will provide a further update once this has been completed.

Mar 21, 09:02 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating reports of missing build logs. The issue has been identified and a resolution is in progress. We will provide a further update when available.

Identified - We've identified the issue that is affecting deployments made with Vercel for GitLab and are working on a fix.

Jan 28, 11:59 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues when creating deployments made with Vercel for GitLab and are working to assess the situation.

Identified - The issue has been identified and a resolution is in progress.

Jan 25, 02:44 UTC

item.title: DNS Record and Wildcard Cert issue Delays
item.description:
Jan 20, 20:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 20, 19:47 UTC
Investigating - We are observing slow DNS updates for new records and wildcard cert issuance due to an ongoing issue with our upstream provider. We are working closely with them to resolve the issue as soon as possible.
